title: She’oodlą’ Bee Désh’į́į’
subtitle: My Faith Looks Up to Thee

verses.html: She’oodlą’ beedésh’į́į́’, God biYashí nílį́, Jesus Diyin, Shisodizinditts’į́į́h, Bee asésiihígíí Ałtso shąąh háánídléh, Shik’ijí dliih.
T’áá ni t’éí honílǫ́, Jesus Ayóo’ áńt’éii, T’áá’ałtsoní Bee níhómíih doogo Áni’dillyaa éí bąą, Doo shididíí chił da, Shik'ijídliih.
Jooba’ shaa diní’aah, Bee shijéí bidziilgo Níneeshdlį́į doo, Jó shá dasínítsą́, Éí bąą hadaałt’éego Ayóó’ánósh’níi doo, Shik’ijídliih.
Saad Hináanii nílį́, Saad bee hinishnáanii, Christ sháyínááł, NiNíłch’i Diyinii Éí bee shił honílǫ́, Nił yah anáásdzáajį́’ Shik’ijídliih.
